TFC is Team Fortress boiled down to its core; each class fills a distinct role and must rely on teammates to kill enemies and complete objectives. But despite this, it's still a very skill-heavy and fast-paced multiplayer shooter that you can play for hours. VERY deserving of a play if you've never tried it before.

This is an unadulterated old school multiplayer team shooter that relies heavily on skill, especially jumping mechanics. It'll also probably cause your external genitalia to withdraw into your body if you're not familiar with it because the population playing today has a wildly high level of ability compared to any potential new player. Therefore my recommendations are as follows: don't be a noob and or get ready to cry H A R D.

"Золотая" классика 90-х . "Сын" Quake Team Fortress и "отец" нынешнего TF2 (если не брать в счет Fortress Forever) . 
 
[b] Плюсы: [/b]
- НЕТ ШАПОК , а значит меньше идиотов , стоящих на спавне без дела
- Убойный геймплей в стиле Half-Life Deathmatch
- 10 классов персонажей
- Куча сбалансированного оружия
- ГРАНАТЫ ( чего стоят только галлюциногенные Шпиона ) 
- Куча разнообразных карт 
- Брутальные Медики и Шпионы , которые могут на равне с Солдатами сражаться в бою
- Мало школьников и идиотов - все сидят в трейде на TF2 :)

[b] Минусы: [/b]
- Мало серверов с народом
Good game, yes

EDIT: This review was written when i was in a VERY angry state and unable to be reasonable. I'm not proud of it at all, but feel free to read and get yourself a good laugh from it.

Stay away from this piece of shit. You will be glad you did.

Unlike TF2 which is fun and rewarding, this crapload of a game is just a complete broken mess. Grenades are spammed everywhere, scouts are nearly useless with weak weapons, engineers are unable to move their buildings, heavies are completely overpowered, medics are appareantly meant to assault and kill people instead of healing, spies cannot cloak and have fucking shotguns, and pyros are completely useless.

And worst of all, ENEMIES CAN USE THE OTHER TEAMS DISPENSERS!!!! WHO THE FUCK THOUGHT OF SOMETHING LIKE THAT?!!

I seriously can't believe games this broken actually exist.

While i can understand that it was a great game for it's time, it has not aged well at all to me.

Even Foxbot, a great bot, cannot save the game from a negative -10/10 review.

NOT RECOMMENDED!!

Ah Team Fortress Classic a good old FPS. The game is basicly like TF2 but with no hats or additonal content. the game is pretty good overall. Though the only problem I have run into is the balancing of the servers, long story short there is none which in my opinion is if your going to take a mod for Half Life 1 and make it a stand  alone game INPROVE ON IT! Now its not that I don't like this game, I do like the wide varitey of people still playing it even though the game came out in 1999. Team Fortress 2 is a superior game but TFC is were it all begun. So the only way I recommend this game is if you liked TF2 or if you want a nostagia trip. So my final verdict would be a 4/10 slightly below average.
More people need to play this game.

8/10

Team Fortres Classic has great mechanics and gameplay, and was tremendous in it's day. Very, very little to complain about in terms of the game itself.

The reason I am not recommending this game is due to how few people still actually play this game. Very few servers still run with very few players, and the people playing on these servers are more than likely very experienced with TFC and therefore extremely good at the game. This makes it really difficult for new players to have an enjoyable experience without the need for hours and hours of practice put into the game.

As I said, this game was great in it's day, and still is now, but unfortunately it's passed it's time.
This game is very fun, it's like tf2 but you don't get jelous when you see someone with a amzing hat...... Buy this game if you can :D

TFC a true game gem , a great game on lans or online when you can find a good server. It is a true shame that this has not become f2p but if your a team base fast pass shooter fan pick it up. The community work on this is insane, maps .... so many maps.

I do reccomend this game but be adviced that it might be difficult for people that haven't played this game from the start. Like me. the first few hours I could not make any kill at all and I still find it troublesome to kill people in this game. but if your looking for a fun game with lots of options this is the right game to purchase. and with such a cheap price. it is defently worth it.

I think this game is amazing. I understand some servers are unfilled. But all you have to do is click on the buttone that says,"has users playing". Otherwise i like this fun easy classic game. This game was made in April 1st, 1999. So shut up about bad graphics. If you hate this game it means you are more modern and not really into technology from the past.

Anyways this is my review of Team Fortress Classic :)

Worth a play if you're big on TF2. Still a classic in its own right.
Classic is in the name. Half-Life mechanics mixed in with multiplayer teams killing each other.

Team Fortresss Classic is a first-person shooter based on the famous QuakeWorld mod of the same name. Team Fortress Classic pits you against Red, Blue, Green and Yellow teams in different maps to capture their points or flags, capturing the final point wins the game.

When this mod started out in Quake World, an online hub for playing Quake and other mods, Team Fortress Classic was taken in by VALVE who hired Robin 'Bro' Walker, Ian 'Scuba' Caughley and John 'Jojie' Cook (the guys who also do TF2!), Diaman Scott (who did the demo, i believe its on Youtube) and developed what is essentially one of the best mods of all time.

Team Fortess Classic is fantastic not because it has hats. Actually this was before even hats existed, before it was even F2P. Hell, there was no custom weapons and only stock! But the fun from this game is astoudingly high, due its varied weapon system, greandes (Oh [i]yes[/i], lots of them). It's quite a blast.
Good game, but if you came here from TF2, expecting to be the same, you're dead wrong.
It's an oldie, but a goody!

I am not a old player of this game, so from my point of view, if you've been playing tf2 for a while, this game would be like: wtf is this...

But anyway, have to respect his game since it is where tf2 comes from.
My first online based video game ever at the age of 10, and I still play it to this very day! Action packed team play. Tons of awesome maps, vanilla and community.
My friends picked on me when I played this game 10/10 would get picked on by mean friends again.
Even in 2014 and with TF2 around, I still play this ancient 1997 TFC game just to see how some people played back then. Worth the $5, but stick with TF2.

I do recommend this game, it is very fun and has alot of character to it. I also enjoy Team Fortress 2 (as you can see by my profile picture) so its very nice to see how much games have developed in the last 15 years! so yes, if you want a nostalgia trip back to the days of blocky body lara croft and the pixelated faces of doom and most importantly HALF LIFE! This is the game for you!
